note: Schools show jumping is the emergent theme of my account. I'm a committee member of the Tshwane Sanesa (schools riding) organisation, and we run four events annually which qualify kids to get to the Gauteng Finals held in July. I'm involved because I love horses and other animals, because my late wife Julia and I were riders, and now my daughter Caitrin is a rider. My son and my wife Ntando aren't riders, but exasperated observers of our equestrian obsessions.
